mapper.select: SELECT DEP.ID_ AS id, DEF.ID_ AS procDefId, DEP.NAME_ AS procDefName, DEP.KEY_ AS `procDefKey`, DEP.TENANT_ID_ AS tenantId, DEP.DEPLOY_TIME_ AS deploymentTime, DEP.DERIVED_FROM_ AS derivedFrom, DEP.DERIVED_FROM_ROOT_ AS derivedFromRoot, DEP.PARENT_DEPLOYMENT_ID_ AS parentDeploymentId, DEP.ENGINE_VERSION_ AS engineVersion, cate.category_name AS categoryName, DEF.VERSION_ AS version, DEF.SUSPENSION_STATE_ AS suspended FROM act_re_deployment AS DEP LEFT JOIN bpm_category AS cate ON DEP.CATEGORY_ = cate.category_code LEFT JOIN act_re_procdef AS DEF ON DEP.ID_ = DEF.DEPLOYMENT_ID_ WHERE DEF.VERSION_ = (SELECT max(VERSION_) FROM ACT_RE_PROCDEF WHERE KEY_ = DEP.KEY_) ORDER BY DEP.ID_ ASC

SELECT DEP.ID_ AS id, DEP.NAME_ AS procDefName, DEP.KEY_ AS `procDefKey`, DEP.TENANT_ID_ AS tenantId, DEP.DEPLOY_TIME_ AS deploymentTime, DEP.DERIVED_FROM_ AS derivedFrom, DEP.DERIVED_FROM_ROOT_ AS derivedFromRoot, DEP.PARENT_DEPLOYMENT_ID_ AS parentDeploymentId, DEP.ENGINE_VERSION_ AS engineVersion, cate.category_code AS categoryCode, cate.category_name AS categoryName, DEF.VERSION_ AS version, DEF.SUSPENSION_STATE_ AS suspended FROM act_re_deployment AS DEP LEFT JOIN bpm_category AS cate ON DEP.CATEGORY_ = cate.category_code LEFT JOIN act_re_procdef AS DEF ON DEP.ID_ = DEF.DEPLOYMENT_ID_ WHERE DEF.VERSION_ = (SELECT max(VERSION_) FROM ACT_RE_PROCDEF WHERE KEY_ = DEP.KEY_) AND DEP.ID_ = #{definitionId} ORDER BY DEP.ID_ ASC
